00023 #ifndef FRUGALVECTOR_H
00024 #define FRUGALVECTOR_H
00025 
00026 #include<vector>
00027 
00028 template<typename T>
00029 class FrugalVector {
00030 
00031 public:
00032   typedef T           value_type;
00033   typedef T*          pointer;
00034   typedef const T*    const_pointer;
00035   typedef T&          reference;
00036   typedef const T&    const_reference;
00037   typedef size_t      size_type;
00038   typedef T*          iterator;
00039   typedef const T*    const_iterator;
00040   typedef FrugalVector<T>                       vector_type;
00041 
00042   T *m_Start;
00043   T *m_End;
00044 
00045   FrugalVector(size_type n, const value_type &val) {
00046     m_Start = new T[n];
00047     m_End = m_Start + n;
00048     std::fill(m_Start, m_End, val);
00049   }
00050 
00051   FrugalVector(size_type n) {
00052     m_Start = new T[n];
00053     m_End = m_Start + n;
00054   }
00055   
00056   FrugalVector() {
00057     m_Start = m_End = NULL;
00058   }
00059   
00060   ~FrugalVector() {
00061     delete [] m_Start;
00062   }
00063 
00064   inline T* begin() { return m_Start; }
00065   inline T* end() { return m_End; }
00066 
00067   inline const T* begin() const { return m_Start; }
00068   inline const T* end() const { return m_End; }
00069 
00070   inline reference
00071   operator[](size_type n) { return *(begin() + n); }
00072 
00073   inline const_reference
00074   operator[](size_type n) const { return *(begin() + n); }
00075 
00076   void resize(size_type n, const T &t) {
00077     if(n > size()) {
00078       T *t_start = new T[n];
00079       std::copy(m_Start, m_End, t_start);
00080       std::fill(t_start + size(), t_start + n, t);
00081       delete [] m_Start;
00082       m_Start = t_start;
00083       m_End = m_Start + n;
00084     }
00085     else if(n < size() && n != 0) {
00086       T * t_start = new T[n];
00087       std::copy(m_Start, m_Start + n, t_start);
00088       delete [] m_Start;
00089       m_Start = t_start;
00090       m_End = m_Start + n;
00091     }
00092     else if(n == 0) {
00093       clear();
00094     }
00095   }
00096   
00097   inline void resize(size_type n) { resize(n, value_type()); }
00098 
00099   inline void clear() {
00100     FreezArray(m_Start);
00101     m_End = NULL;
00102   }
00103 
00104   inline void push_back(const value_type& t) {
00105     resize(size() + 1);
00106     *(m_End - 1) = t;
00107   }
00108 
00109   inline size_type capacity() const { return size_type(m_End - m_Start); }
00110 
00111   inline bool empty() const { return m_Start == m_End; }
00112   
00113   inline size_type size() const { return size_type(m_End - m_Start); }
00114 
00115 };
00116 
00117 #endif /* FRUGALVECTOR_H */
